customer_message: The application crashes immediately when I try to open the settings menu. I'm using Windows 11 and this started happening after the latest update. I've tried restarting my computer but the issue persists.
I would really appreciate if you could add a feature to export reports in PDF format. Currently, I can only export as CSV or Excel, but my manager requires PDF reports for presentations.
Can you help me understand how to set up automated backups? I see there's a backup option in the settings, but I'm not sure what frequency I should use or where the backups are stored.
The payment gateway is completely broken. I've been trying to process a transaction for the past 30 minutes but keep getting 'Payment failed' errors. My credit card works fine on other sites.
It would be great to have a mobile app version of this platform. I often need to check data while on the go, and the current web interface doesn't work well on my phone.
How do I change my account password? I can't find the password settings in my profile, and I need to update it for security reasons.
The search functionality is not working at all. When I search for any term, it returns no results even though I know the data exists. This makes the platform unusable for me.
I'd like to request a bulk import feature for user data. Currently, I have to add users one by one, which is very time-consuming when setting up accounts for my entire team.
What's the difference between the 'Basic' and 'Premium' subscription plans? I'm trying to decide which one is right for my small business needs.
The data synchronization is completely broken. Changes I make on one device don't appear on other devices, even after waiting for hours. This is causing major workflow issues.
Could you add integration with Google Calendar? It would be very helpful to automatically sync our project deadlines with our team's calendar.
How do I invite team members to collaborate on a project? I see there's a 'Share' button but I'm not sure what permissions to give them.
The notification system is not working. I'm not receiving any email alerts or in-app notifications, even though I have them enabled in my settings.
I would love to see a dark mode theme option. The current bright interface strains my eyes during late-night work sessions.
How do I set up two-factor authentication for my account? I want to improve the security of my account but can't find the 2FA settings.
The API is returning 500 errors for all requests. This is affecting our integration and causing our automated processes to fail.
It would be helpful to have a dashboard widget that shows real-time analytics. Currently, I have to manually refresh the page to see updated statistics.
Can you explain how the billing cycle works? I'm confused about when I'll be charged and what happens if I exceed my plan's limits.
The file upload feature is broken. Files larger than 10MB fail to upload with a generic error message, and smaller files sometimes get corrupted.
I'd like to request a feature to create custom templates for reports. This would save me a lot of time when generating regular reports for my team.
